physical_appearance: "The image displays two sets of coffee cups and saucers. Both of them are of the same size and shape. The cup and saucer on the left hand side of the image both have a green band running around them. The initials ""RH"" are displayed on the both of them in green. The cup and saucer on the right hand side of the image both have a gold band running around them. The initials ""RH"" are displayed on the both of them in gold. "
title_text: Two Coffee Cup and Saucer Sets Two Coffee Cup Sets
